mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTE_TYPES (NAME, VALUE_SYNTAX_ID, CONTENTS) VALUES (#{name}, #{valueSyntaxId}, #{contents})
mapper.select: select A.*, AT.NAME, AT.VALUE_SYNTAX_ID from ATTRIBUTES A, ATTRIBUTE_TYPES AT WHERE A.ENTITY_ID = #{entityId} AND A.GROUP_ID = #{groupId} AND A.TYPE_ID = AT.ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTES (TYPE_ID, ENTITY_ID, GROUP_ID, VALUES) VALUES (#{typeId}, #{entityId}, #{groupId}, #{values})
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTRIBUTES SET VALUES = #{values} WHERE TYPE_ID = #{typeId} AND ENTITY_ID = #{entityId} AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTRIBUTES WHERE TYPE_ID = #{typeId} AND ENTITY_ID = #{entityId} AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
